plot: One man's account of his fall into drugs from childhood, his addiction, dealing, the spiraling downfall, and the long journey back to normalcy after prison.
title: This is Joe Smith
plot_es: One man's account of his fall into drugs from childhood, his addiction, dealing, the spiraling downfall, and the long journey back to normalcy after prison.
plot_en: One man's account of his fall into drugs from childhood, his addiction, dealing, the spiraling downfall, and the long journey back to normalcy after prison.
